Buff_EvadeAddEffect_Level1_des: Dodging has a chance to cost no dodge attempts.
Buff_Matrix_39_Level1_on: Every time volt damage is dealt, there is a 40% chance of triggering chain lighting, dealing damage equal to ???%/???%/???%/???% of volt ATK to up to 7 targets. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Every time chain lightning is triggered, increase volt damage by ???% for 6 seconds (chain lightning will not trigger attack effects). This effect cannot be stacked. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Buff_TianLang_AttackUP_Level1: Increase volt damage by ???% for 8 seconds.
Buff_TianLang_AttackUP_Level2: Increase volt damage by ???% for 8 seconds.
Buff_Tianlang_Level1_des: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains 1 free dodge attempt, up to 2 attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by ???% for 8 seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.
Buff_Tianlang_Level2_des: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains 1 free dodge attempt, up to 3 attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by ???% for 8 seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.
Buff_Tianlang_SSR_Level0_des: Volt Reactions: Increase volt ATK by 20% and volt resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more volt weapons. This effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of Volt Resonance.
Buff_Tianlang_SSR_Level1_des: Gain 1 stack of Superconductor per charge: Increase Max HP by ???% but increase damage received by ???% (except when the current HP is lower than ??? times of volt ATK and no HP Shield is equipped), stacking up to 8 times. Lose 1 stack if no Superconductor gets refreshed within ??? seconds.
Buff_Tianlang_SSR_Level3_des: Release any volt weapon skill or discharge skill to get 2 charges. Gain hyperbody at 8 Superconductor stacks.
Buff_Tianlang_SSR_Level5_des: Each Superconductor stack increases final damage by ???%.
Buff_Tianlang_SSR_Level6_des: Boost Dubhe's Volt Sense: For every 1 other volt weapon sensed, gain ???% volt damage boost for ??? seconds.
Buff_Tianlang_ThuInteraction_L6_des: Volt Sense: For every 1 other volt weapon sensed, gain ???% volt damage boost for ??? seconds.
Buff_Tianlang_ThuInteraction_des: Volt Sense: For every 1 other volt weapon sensed, gain ???% volt damage boost for ??? seconds.
Buff_Tianlang_Thunder_Resonance_des: Volt Reactions: Increase volt ATK by 20% and volt resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more volt weapons. This effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of Volt Resonance.
Buff_Tianlang_WeaponCharged_des: Consume 1 charge point to deal extra damage after hitting the target with a volt weapon dodge skill.
GA_FPlayerTianLangChangeSkill_Success_de:
When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder. Thunderbreaker unleashes wide-range volt damage, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and transforms enemies and your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities. Up to 3 Electrified Entities can exist at a time.

Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge skill, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to 5% of missing HP (no less than 100% volt ATK, no more than 1,000% volt ATK).

When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge consumes 30% of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to 50% of the consumed HP (no less than 480% of volt ATK and no more than 3,000% of volt ATK) and gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League). After 8 seconds or when HP is lower than 10%, recover 5% missing HP every second for 8 seconds (not affected by healing effects). The recovery effect is not stackable.
GA_FPlayerTianLangEvade_Evade_des: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for 0.5 seconds while dodging.
GA_FPlayerTianLangEvade_ForwardAttack_de:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging.
Dash to attack the target, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
GA_FPlayerTianLangSkill_Skill_des:
Unleash a barrage of attacks, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? to enemies in range, and transforms enemies and your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities, which allow up to 3 Electrified Entities exist at a time. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

Gain Volt Sense when Dubhe is used: Scan the other two equipped weapons when unleashing skills. Each additional volt weapon sensed by it increases volt ATK by 15% for 25 seconds.

Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to 5% of missing HP (no less than 100% volt ATK, no more than 1,000% volt ATK).

When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge skill consumes 30% of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to 50% of the consumed HP (no less than 480% volt ATK, no more than 3,000% volt ATK) and gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League). 8 seconds later or when HP is lower than 10%, recover 5% missing HP every second for 8 seconds (not affected by healing effects). The recovery effect is not stackable.
GA_PlayerTianLangMelee_AirAttack_des:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
GA_PlayerTianLangMelee_Branch_des:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger.
Deal damage up to ???% of ATK + ??? to the target and gather enemies around you.
GA_PlayerTianLangMelee_JumpAttack_des:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger.
While falling, deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? to nearby targets.
GA_PlayerTianLangMelee_Melee_des:
While on the ground, initiate 6 attacks in a row with Thunderbreaker.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to {10}% of ATK + {11} and launch the target.
MatrixSuit_SSR20_des1: Every time volt damage is dealt, there is a 40% chance of triggering chain lighting, dealing damage equal to ???%/???%/???%/???% of volt ATK to up to 7 targets. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Every time chain lightning is triggered, increase volt damage by ???% for 6 seconds (chain lightning will not trigger attack effects). This effect cannot be stacked. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
MatrixSuit_SSR20_des2: Every time a volt weapon's skill or discharge skill is used, increase volt damage by ???%/???%/???%/???% for 15 seconds. This effect cannot be stacked. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
Nitai_tianlang_SSR_desc: Unlock Thunderbreaker to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Tian Lang, the weapon's Simulacrum.
choose_matrix_SSR20_des: A box containing all the Tian Lang Matrices included.
choose_matrix_SSR20_use: Choose any one Tian Lang Matrix.
matrix_SSR20_1_1: If he was born in ancient times, he might have been a great general defending his land.
matrix_SSR20_2_1: Rather than fighting, he prefers to spend time with flowers and plants in peace.
matrix_SSR20_3_1: The trees long for peace, but the wind will never cease. There is nothing that can be done.
operate_pojun_desc: Instructions for Thunderbreaker. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.
tianlang_reason_1: Both the 2-piece and the 4-piece set increase the off-hand slot damage increase of Thunderbreaker in a volt group.
tianlang_reason_2: The 3-piece set increases the damage dealt when HP is low, making it a great match for Thunderbreaker.
tianlang_thunder_ssr_1: This long spear covered in lightning is the SMA1-TS000-Thunderbreaker. It is able to unleash the stored power through unimaginable means. The electric field that it generates disrupts the mind of its wielder, so it cannot be mastered by ordinary people.
tianlangpugongbeidongdes: When wielding Thunderbreaker, every 4 normal attacks will charge the weapon, stacking up to 5 charges. After charging, any Electromancy dodge skill triggers electrocution with lightning. Lightning damage dealt equals 5% of HP lost (but no lower than 100% of Volt ATK, and no higher than 1,000% of Volt ATK) , and triggers Electrified Entity, which deals area volt damage equal to 2% of HP lost (no lower than 40% of Volt ATK, and no higher than 400% of Volt ATK).
